short_summary: Requires one physician onsite to deliver occupational health services to RCMP members in D Division, Manitoba. Anticipated contract duration is 2 years, with option to extend additional 3 years.
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the services of one physician to provide onsite occupational health services to RCMP Members in ‘D’ Division, Manitoba. The anticipated level of effort is forty hours per week. The operating hours within which the site is able to accommodate physician services for the site are 8:00 am to 18:00 pm Monday to Friday. The contract is for a period of 2 years, with option to extend the term of the contract by up to 3 additional one-year periods.
